name: re-reselect
description: Enhance Reselect selectors with deeper memoization and cache management

scripts.test:bundles: npm run test:bundles:snapshot && npm run test:bundles:unit
scripts.test:bundles:unit: vitest run --config ./test-bundles/cjs.vitest.config.mts && vitest run --config ./test-bundles/es.vitest.config.mts && vitest run --config ./test-bundles/umd.vitest.config.mts
scripts.prepare: npx simple-git-hooks && npm run source:check && npm run test -- --run && npm run build && npm run test:bundles
scripts.release: npm run prepare && npx changeset publish
scripts.source:check: npm run prettier:check && npm run type:check

author: Andrea Carraro <me@andreacarraro.it>
